name: df-mrsub
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cmrsub, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, co(cfv(cmrex, cv(s0)), cpm, cfv(cmvar, cv(s0))), cmpt(s2, cfv(cmrex, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfrmd, cun(cfv(cmcn, cv(s0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(s0)))), cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s3, cun(cfv(cmcn, cv(s0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(s0))), cif(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3)), cs1(cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cdm(cv(s1))))), cv(s2)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mRSubst =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà((mREx ` s0)[p‚Ü¶](mVR ` s0))‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(mREx ` s0)‚Ü¶((freeMnd `((mCN ` s0)‚ãÉ(mVR ` s0)))[gsum]((s3 ‚àà((mCN ` s0)‚ãÉ(mVR ` s0))‚Ü¶ if(s3 ‚àà dom(s1),(s1 ` s3), <" s3 ">))‚àò s2)))))
comment: Define a substitution of raw expressions given a mapping from variables to expressions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
